summary: Biturbo - Biturbo is the first hybrid EVM blockchain utilizing PoT + PoL. Biturbo introduces a unique mining mechanism that utilizes both Proof of Transaction (PoT) and Proof of Liquidity (PoL) to enhance network security and activity. Combining Proof of Transaction (PoT) from Bitcoin and Proof of Liquidity (PoL) from Ethereum, Biturbo creates an inclusive, EVM-compatible blockchain that rewards active participation and liquidity provision.
